body.name: CUBOT X70 Unlocked Phones(24G+256G),Android 13 Smartphone,100MP+32MP Main/Front Camera,6.58" HD Display Cell Phone,8-core Processor 5200mAh Battery Mobile Phones,Dual SIM/NFC/Fingerprint

features: 🥇[24GB+256GB Large Storage] Cubot X70, a new model of unlocked cell phone, equipped with 12GB+12GB (virtual memory can be turned on in the settings if needed) RAM and 256GB ROM, which can support 1TB external SD card expansion. It can completely accommodate all the data content you transferred from your old mobile phone, whether it is photos, audios, videos, or stored data. No longer need to worry about insufficient space to save,X70 smart phone gives you a very secure experience.

🥇[100MP&32MP Main Camera] With 100MP rear main camera, this cell phone allows you capture every wonderful and beautiful moment more clearly. The 32MP front lens is intelligently optimized to capture your pretty expressions in every selfie. The camera of the phone contains a variety of parameter settings, such as portrait beauty, night shot anti-shake, panoramic photography, time-lapse photography, etc., to meet diverse professional shooting needs.

🥇[5200mAh Long-Lasting Battery] This X70 smart phone is equipped with a 5200 mAh battery, giving you long-term standby and continuous connectivity throughout the day. It is also equipped with an 18W fast charger to optimize charging in quickly and intelligently way for extending battery life.

🥇[Android 13 and 8 Core Power] The newly upgraded Android 13 system provides a smoother and safer high-performance experience. CUBOT X70 uses an oct a-core Helio G99 processor, 6m 2*A76 2.2GHz+6*A55 2.0GHz configuration, 120 Hz refresh rate, which ensures all the tasks are completed in lightning-fast processing speeds.

🥇[6.58"HD Fill-view Screen] Indispensable is the 6.58-inch HD and IPS capacitive touch screen with 1080*2408 resolution, which allows playing games, watching TV, etc. to experience vivid and wonderful images like movies.

🥇[Dual SIM Mobile Phones]This cell phone supports dual SIM card and is available in 2G, 3G and 4G frequency bands. At the same time, other functions such as NFC, GPS, and fingerprint unlocking are all equipped. If you have any questions when using your mobile phone, you can contact us and we will give you the most timely and effective answer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Powerful and Feature-Packed Smartphone
reviews.reviewText: I recently got my hands on the CUBOT X70, and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations in many ways. This unlocked Android smartphone is a powerhouse, offering a wide range of impressive features and specifications.Firstly, the 6.58" HD display is simply stunning. It provides sharp and vibrant visuals, making it a joy to watch videos, play games, and browse through apps. The large screen size also enhances the overall viewing experience, making everything feel more immersive. The storage capacity of 24GB RAM and 256GB ROM is more than sufficient for all my needs. I have never had to worry about running out of space, and I can easily store my extensive photo collection, apps, and media files without any trouble. This is a huge plus for someone who loves taking photos and downloading new apps regularly. One of the standout features of the CUBOT X70 is its impressive camera setup. The 100MP main camera delivers exceptional image quality, allowing me to capture stunningly detailed photos in any lighting condition. Whether it's landscapes, portraits, or close-ups, this camera never disappoints. The 32MP front camera is equally impressive, bringing out the best in my selfies and ensuring clear video calls.Performance-wise, this phone shines with its 8-core processor. It effortlessly handles multitasking, allowing me to switch between apps seamlessly and run power-intensive tasks without any lag. I have not experienced any slowdowns or performance issues, even when using resource-intensive apps and games.Battery life is another area where the CUBOT X70 excels. The 5200mAh battery easily lasts me throughout the day, even with heavy usage. It also charges quickly, minimizing the time spent tethered to a power outlet. The phone's dual SIM support is a welcome feature, allowing me to use two different numbers or take advantage of different carrier plans. NFC capability adds convenience, enabling contactless payments with just a tap.Lastly, the fingerprint sensor on the CUBOT X70 provides an extra layer of security, ensuring that only I can access my phone's content. It works quickly and accurately, making unlocking the device a breeze.In conclusion, the CUBOT X70 is an impressive unlocked smartphone that offers a plethora of outstanding features. From its impressive camera capabilities, powerful performance, and generous storage capacity to the stunning display, long-lasting battery, and convenient features like dual SIM and NFC, this phone checks all the boxes. If you're in the market for a feature-packed and powerful smartphone, the CUBOT X70 is definitely worth considering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Phones Great, only issue is Wifi will not work for some odd reason but will work for all the other devices being used , and I went and got rid of a device to see if it was just this and sure enough , also my phone had developer settings already unlocked without me having to tap build 7 times , a little suspicious

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Battery cannot be removed or replaced.
reviews.reviewText: All my Cubot phones in the past have had a removable battery. This one does not.This is a major design decision that impacts everything about whether or not I would ever want such a product. It is guaranteed to die, permanently, at some point in the next couple of years.And that's only the beginnings of the problems with a battery like this. It means I can't ever actually turn it off. Not really.Sorry, Cubot. You had a fan and an advocate with me until this. I recommended Cubot to my friends (who bought one) because of your phones' ability to remove & replace the battery. But you really dropped the ball here.So the battery life of this Cubot is much, much less than any phone that has a removable (and thus, replace-able) battery. In a couple of years, this phone will be dead, and un-repairable. It might be possible to take it to a shop but instead of a $15 battery, I'd have to pay as much as I would for a new phone to just keep this one working.And so, 1* for this one.

Buon cellulare ma, mi aspettavo di più. Una pecca: difficoltà a scaricare i dati nonostante avessi scaricato i driver dal sito cubot
Esteticamente ben fatto ,ma tutto il resto e pessimo in più nella descrizione cita che è dual sim ma nn esiste un'altra slot o per lo meno nn l'abbiamo vista
nel complesso non è male, ma il mio purtroppo ha avuto problemi con il microfono dell'auricolare per le telefonate
